intro: Jasione montana var. laevis, commonly known as the smooth yarrow, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads and aromatic foliage. The plant typically grows in grassy areas and along roadsides, preferring well-drained soils. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers are small, yellowish, and arranged in flat-topped clusters. Jasione montana var. laevis is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
